Project Description
OpenControls is a framework designed to make your life easier when developing WindowsForms Applications.
It has a toolset of custom controls ready-to-use that implements CSS specs and help you customize the UI properties of the control.

OpenControls

In this project we will try to make the .NET WindowsForms developers easier by taking care of the control's customizations using CSS to customize the control's UI.
Instead of using a lot of XML files or something like that, you can use the good and old CSS file that contains all the definitions to apply to controls.
It's very easy to use and I can guarantee that you'll be a lot more happier than you were before it.

Just give a try. :)
